sentences.sContent: When the investigation is concluded, the results will be sent to the US Attorney’s office.
sentences.sCn: 等到调查结束后，结果会被送到联邦检察官办公室。

sentences.sContent: Francis, having concluded his business with James, left for Miami.
sentences.sCn: 弗朗西斯完成了和詹姆斯的买卖后就去了迈阿密。

sentences.sContent: ...we can conclude that curiosity is very important and helpful in personal development...
...I'll conclude with an update on the 100...
...What can we conclude about the Keep-The-Drive Summit...
...What do we conclude from the woman’s remarks about Bob Russel...

synos.tran: 推断；决定，[劳经]作结论；结束

remMethod.val: con(共同) ＋ clud(关闭) ＋ e → 全部关闭 → 结束

words.tran: 决定性的；最后的；确实的；确定性的
结束；推断；作结论（conclude的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to complete something you have been doing, especially for a long time

trans.tranCn: 推断出，推论出；缔结，议定
trans.tranOther: to decide that something is true after considering all the information you have
